title: (x) Puls Biznesu newspaper sans serif - Flama {Yves}
content:
I’m sure I’ve seen this <cite>e</cite> before but can’t find the font now. Does anybody know what the font is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214115516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puls_1_5512.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214115516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puls_2_4460.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214115516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/puls_3_5320.jpg)

Thanks,  
Antoni
author: Urquell

comments.content:
Ahhh, at village I've seen this.

Thanks, Yves.
